testcase.name: a thumbnail should be choice according the size chosen.

testcase.classname: PhantomJS 1.9 (Windows).TitleControllers Should request titles from back-end

testcase.name: requests should be perform when user try to navigate between pages on pagination
when the user click over a title the popup should be displayed but if it had was marked for deletion nothing should be happens.
if titleDisplay have more than 40 charecters it should be displayed on the tooltip otherwise nothing should be displayerd
when the title have more than 40 characters it should be splitted to get in this size and "..." should be concatenated with end of it.
when the user navigate between the pages in the pagination, sometimes some buttons should receive a hide class.
the date should be formatted with this pattern: dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss

testcase.name: requests should be perform when user try to navigate between pages on pagination
when the user click over a title the popup should be displayed but if it had was marked for deletion nothing should be happens.
if titleDisplay have more than 40 charecters it should be displayed on the tooltip otherwise nothing should be displayerd
when the title have more than 40 characters it should be splitted to get in this size and "..." should be concatenated with end of it.
when the user navigate between the pages in the pagination, sometimes some buttons should receive a hide class.
the date should be formatted with this pattern: dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss
